channel.title: Range Glitch?
channel.description:
Okay well when i use range on monsters, it doesn't make them attack, they just stay where they r...
for example, Jad, normaly it wil run at me and attack, but if u attack with a bow, it will just make them stop rite there and they wont atk...
if u atk with mele they stil come at u, any ideas how to fix this? :D
